attributes.action: change the law regarding changes of leadership in the ruling government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to draw attention to the definition of democracy, regarding the changing of leadership in a ruling government. To have an unelected Prime Minister in power is undemocratic and goes against the constitution of this country.  I call for a change in the law, stating that ANY change in leadership of the ruling government, regardless of political party, invokes an immediate general election and therefore imbues the leader with a mandate from the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
